definitions: of the nature of, caused by, or relating to a virus or viruses

examples.text: vaccines targeted at multiple viral antigens

shortDefinitions: of nature of, caused by, or relating to virus or viruses

definitions: relating to or involving an image, video, piece of information, etc., that is circulated rapidly and widely from one internet user to another

examples.text: the video went viral and was seen by millions

shortDefinitions: relating to or involving rapid spread of information from one internet user to another

definitions: an image, video, advertisement, etc., that is circulated rapidly on the internet

examples.text: the rise of virals in online marketing

shortDefinitions: image, video, advertisement, etc. that is circulated rapidly on internet
